hosting_order_upgrade_error: An error has occurred updating your hosting plan.
hosting_order_upgrade_modal_header_descr: Is your project growing? From blogs and business websites to online shops and web applications, you can choose the best plan for your new needs.
hosting_order_upgrade_start_time_explain: The time you select will match your local time zone. If the time selected has passed, the update will be carried out the next day.
hosting_order_upgrade_start_time_info: Any change to a Cloud Web Hosting plan will result in a maximum of 15 minutes of downtime after the operation has begun. For this reason, we recommend opting for a migration that takes place during the night, to limit traffic loss.
hosting_migrate_my_ovh_org_success: Your ovh.org domain migration has been processed. You will receive an email when it is complete.
hosting_migrate_my_ovh_org_error: An error has occurred migrating your ovh.org domain.
hosting_tab_BOOST_supported_performance: The BOOST option can only be used with the Performance plan.
hosting_tab_BOOST_supported_performance_: Migrate quickly and without interrupting service via this button:
hosting_tab_BOOST_boost_enabled: Your plan is currently boosted to the {{t0}} plan
hosting_tab_BOOST_request_description: The Boost option gives your web hosting plan a temporary performance boost, with a daily rate based on your specific needs.
hosting_tab_BOOST_request_description_bi: This option is billed at {{price}} ex. VAT per day of usage, for each additional use. You can disable it or change the level, higher or lower, at any time.
hosting_tab_BOOST_request_description_pa: Unless you choose to disable it, this option will remain activated. When you disable it, you’ll be billed for the entire duration of usage. The amount will be debited from your payment method, saved in the “Billing/My payment methods” section of the OVHcloud Control Panel.
hosting_tab_BOOST_request_success: Your plan has been successfully boosted.
hosting_tab_BOOST_request_error: An error has occurred boosting your plan.
hosting_tab_BOOST_update_title: You want to change your boost plan.
hosting_tab_BOOST_update_error: An error has occurred changing your boost plan.
hosting_tab_BOOST_disable_title: You’re about to disable the Boost option for your web hosting plan.
hosting_tab_BOOST_disable_description: A bill will be sent to you soon, covering the entire activation period with per day billing.
hosting_tab_BOOST_disable_description_pa: You can re-enable the Boost option at any time.
hosting_tab_BOOST_accept_cgv: I have understood and accept the terms and conditions of service.
hosting_tab_BOOST_disable_success: Your boost plan has been deactivated.
hosting_tab_BOOST_disable_error: An error has occurred disabling your boost plan.
hosting_tab_AUTOMATED_EMAILS_guide_help: Need help with your emails sent from scripts?
hosting_tab_AUTOMATED_EMAILS_info: This page only shows emails sent from CGI/PERL/PHP scripts.
hosting_tab_AUTOMATED_EMAILS_purge_info: Firstly, you need to block the sending of emails before you can purge them.
hosting_tab_AUTOMATED_EMAILS_error: An error has occurred retrieving the information:
hosting_tab_AUTOMATED_EMAILS_block_quest: You are about to block emails sent from your Web Hosting plan. No emails will be deleted, they will be put on hold for 72 hours. During this period, you can either unblock the sending or purge it.
hosting_tab_AUTOMATED_EMAILS_purge_quest: You are about to delete all pending emails for your account. Your account will then be automatically unblocked. The operation takes between 5 and 10 minutes.
hosting_tab_AUTOMATED_EMAILS_unblock_que: You are about to unblock the sending of your emails. The distribution will resume as soon as the next email is sent. Emails that were blocked will be redistributed.
hosting_tab_AUTOMATED_EMAILS_err_reports: Enter the email address where you would like to receive error reports. If errors occur when sending emails from your web hosting plan, you will receive a report the next day.
The email address that error reports will be sent to has been changed.
An error has occurred changing the email address that error reports will be sent to:
You must enter an email address.

hosting_change_main_domain_help_title: Attach your hosting plan to one of your other domains
hosting_change_main_domain_help_desc: You cannot change your primary domain to an external domain. You will need to transfer your domain to OVHcloud beforehand in order to attach it to your hosting plan.
hosting_change_main_domain_help_keep_ema: With a hosting plan, you can have email addresses associated with your domain. If you transfer your domain, you will need to subscribe to the MX Plan to keep these addresses.
hosting_change_main_domain_help_mxplan_d: For more information about the MX Plan solution, click
hosting_change_main_domain_help_ssl_desc: If you change the primary domain name, the SSL certificate will not be added to it. You will need to purchase an SSL certificate

hosting_dashboard_service_delete_ssl_war: Are you sure that you want to remove SSL from your hosting plan?

common_api_hostingWeb-1: You cannot migrate to this solution, because your current solution has more email capacity than the solution you have selected.
